H0.text: Heat, water, and soil are needed by all animals to survive.

H1.text: Sunlight, soil, and heat are what all animals need in order to survive.

H2.text: Sunlight, air, and food are what all animals need to survive.

H3.text: Food, water, and air are required for all animals to survive.

A4.text: Vitamins, minerals, fiber, and water do not provide energy, but are required for other reasons.
